The professor can consider adding more discussion on individual outline before writing drafts, and give us more concrete feedback so that we could comprehend where to improve better.

I think if the professor print out the handout we use in class, we could take notes and learn more efficiently. Moreover, I wish the professor could give more instruction before assigning us an essay. (常常老師要的都和我們交上去的有點落差，所以希望可以講更清楚一點)
老師討論journal跟response的時間可以減少點,多增加像是寫作技巧的教授。希望下學期老師可以買教科書或是印講義出來,畢竟在網路上學習成效有限
